member.summary: Adds a probe for Azure Search.
member.param: The health probe name. If not specified will be used.
member.remarks: This diagnostic executes an operation on to retrieve the underlying Search service statistics.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Search.Azure.AzureSearchServiceHealthExtensions.AddAzureSearchIndexDiagnostic(Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.IHealthProbesBuilder,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Adds a diagnostic for the specified Azure Search index.
member.param: The name of the index that should be diagnosed.
The health probe name. If not specified will be used.
member.remarks: This diagnostic executes an operation on to determine whether the specified index exists.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Search.Azure.AzureSearchServiceHealthExtensions.AddAzureSearchIndexerDiagnostic(Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.IHealthProbesBuilder,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Adds a diagnostic for the specified Azure Search indexer.
member.param: The name of the indexer that should be diagnosed.
The health probe name. If not specified will be used.
member.remarks: This diagnostic executes an operation on to determine whether the specified indexer exists.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Search.Azure.AzureSearchServiceHealthExtensions.AddAzureSearchDataSourceDiagnostic(Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.IHealthProbesBuilder,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Adds a diagnostic for the specified Azure Search data source.
member.param: The name of the data source that should be diagnosed.
The health probe name. If not specified will be used.
member.remarks: This diagnostic executes an operation on to determine whether the specified data source exists.
